attributes.description:
Introducing the all-new, all-conquering GWM P-Series Commercial Double Cab. The P-Series Commercial Double Cab is a brand-new addition to the range of robust, reliable and "workaholic"GWM bakkies that are built for true versatility. This legendary bakkie is powerful, not just instinctively, but practically. To elevate your travels to even greater heights, the Commercial Double Cab features an option of a responsive 8AT and 6MT gearbox, multi-link rear suspension and is powered by a 2.0 litre diesel engine with a mighty 120kW and 400n.m of torque.
Highly spec features include:
-	17"Alloy Rim
-	Sidestep
-	Centre Soft Covering of Front & Rear Door Panel
-	Steering Wheel Controls
-	3.5 Inch Colour Instrument Cluster
-	12V Power Outlet
-	Front Usb Port (2)
-	Cruise Control
-	Vehicle Stability Control (Esc/Esp)
-	Hydraulic Brake Assist System (Hba)
-	Traction Control System (Tcs)
-	Hill-Start Assist Control
-	Hill Decent Control
-	Tpms (Tyre Pressure Monitor System)
-	Rear Parking Sensors
-	Dual Front Airbags
-	Front & Rear Electric Windows
-	Daytime Running Lights
-	5year/100 000Km manufacturer’s warranty and service plan
attributes.title: 2022 GWM P-Series CV 2.0 TD SX 4x4 Auto Double-Cab

Top Speed Motors is AA Dekra affiliated as well as RMI and MIWA Approved and also accredited at all major banks, Wesbank, Absa, Standard Bank, MFC and IEMAS to accommodate you with all your financial needs. Top Speed Motors delivers country wide!! Also, visit our Facebook page for daily and weekly specials and competitions. Terms and conditions apply.

attributes.title: 2007 Chevrolet Lumina 6.0 SS Auto

attributes.description:
Introducing the all-new, all-conquering GWM P-Series. The bakkie reimagined. The P-Series Commercial Single Cab is a brand-new addition to the range of robust, reliable and "workaholic" GWM bakkies that are built for true versatility. This legendary bakkie is powerful, not just instinctively, but practically. To elevate your travels to even greater heights, the Commercial Single Cab features a 6MT gearbox, and available in 2WD or 4WD variants.
Highly spec features include:
17" Alloy Rim
-	Sidestep
-	Guardrail
-	Steering Wheel Controls
-	3.5 Inch Colour Instrument Cluster
-	12V Power Outlet
-	Front Usb Port
-	Vehicle Stability Control (Esc/Esp)				
-	Hydraulic Brake Assist System (Hba)				
-	Traction Control System (Asr/Tcs)				
-	Collision Automatic Unlock Function				
-	Collision Automatic Fuel Cut Function				
-	Hill-Start Assist Control				
-	Cruise Control
-	Rear Parking Sensor
-	Dual Front Airbags
-	Bluetooth hands-free calling system
-	9" Touch Screen				
-	Car play & Android Auto				
-	Front Electric Windows
-	Daytime Running Lights

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. The 8th generation of a South African classic. Introducing the all-new Honda Ballade Elegance CVT.

The poise and elegance you’ve come to expect. The technology and reliability you have a right to demand with larger dimensions, superior quality, new technology and a sporty new exterior.

This fuel efficient vehicle comes with a 5 year / 200000km warranty, 4 year / 60000km service plan and 3 year roadside assistance.

Book your test drive today!
